name: Daniel Rey Cimafranca
text: Maganda point ni Congressman kanina sa interview ni Ted Failon.  40M supposedly employed but SSS getting remittances only from 11M.  Parang BIR taxation lang din, pwede ayusin collection bago taasan ang rates.    Hayz bahala na sila kung ano gusto nila gawin sa SSS.  May PERA naman, with 5% annual tax credit pa.
